title: In cases where development is not completed, it shall be permissible to avail the balance developmen
clause_text: In cases where development is not completed, it shall be permissible to avail the balance development rights as permissible under these Regulations by utilizing the TDR or additional FSI on payment of Premium by adjusting the payments made earlier for availing FSI if
